message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $9,500. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with its value to me.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However,  I'm looking for something closer to $9,250. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your efforts in adjusting the price, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider $9,000 as my final offer for the product. I believe this aligns closely with its value to me.
